hero.title: Transform Long Links Into Powerful Insights
hero.subtitle: Create short, trackable links with real-time analytics, QR codes, and global geo-targeting. Turn every click into actionable data.

features.title: Everything You Need To Scale Your Links
features.subtitle: Powerful features built for marketers, businesses, and creators who demand more from their links.

shortLinks.title: Smart Short Links
shortLinks.desc: Create branded short URLs that boost click-through rates and build trust with your audience.

analytics.title: Real-Time Analytics
analytics.desc: Track every click with detailed insights: device type, location, time, referrer, and more.

geo.title: Geo-Targeting
geo.desc: Know exactly where your audience is coming from with country-level geographic tracking.

qr.title: Dynamic QR Codes
qr.desc: Automatically generate QR codes for every link. Perfect for print materials and offline campaigns.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.desc: Sub-100ms redirects powered by Redis caching. Your users won't even notice the redirect.

secure.title: Secure & Reliable
secure.desc: Enterprise-grade security with HTTPS, JWT authentication, and 99.9% uptime guarantee.

howItWorks.title: Get Started In Seconds
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to transform your links

step1.title: Paste Your URL
step1.desc: Copy any long URL and paste it into urlio.in. No registration required for quick links.

step2.title: Get Your Short Link
step2.desc: Instantly receive a clean, short link and a QR code ready to share anywhere.

step3.title: Track Performance
step3.desc: Monitor clicks, locations, and engagement in real-time from your dashboard.

useCases.title: Built For Every Use Case
useCases.subtitle: Whether you're a marketer, creator, or business owner

social.title: Social Media
social.desc: Share clean links on Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, and more. Track which platforms drive the most engagement.

email.title: Email Campaigns
email.desc: Shorten links for newsletters and track click-through rates across different campaigns.

marketing.title: Marketing Campaigns
marketing.desc: Create trackable links for ads, landing pages, and promotional materials with full analytics.

business.title: Business Growth
business.desc: Understand your audience, optimize conversions, and make data-driven decisions with powerful insights.

cta.title: Ready To Transform Your Links?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users who trust urlio.in for their link management needs.

password.title: Change Admin Password
password.minLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
